mapper.sql: select pottery_altar_id, tenant_id, pottery_altar_number, pottery_altar_state, fire_zone_id, pottery_altar_full_altar_weight, pottery_altar_qr_code_address, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from laocz_pottery_altar_management
mapper.select:
SELECT llm.liquor_name, lbpm.liquor_batch_id, lbpm.actual_weight, lbpm.storing_time as StorageDuration, llm.liquor_level, llm.liquor_round, llm.liquor_flavor_name, llm.liquor_source, llm.liquor_brewing_time, llm.liquor_year, llm.liquor_content FROM laocz_batch_pottery_mapping lbpm LEFT JOIN laocz_liquor_batch llb ON lbpm.liquor_batch_id = llb.liquor_batch_id LEFT JOIN laocz_liquor_management llm ON llb.liquor_management_id = llm.liquor_management_id
and lbpm.pottery_altar_id = #{potteryAltarId}

SELECT lpam.pottery_altar_number, lpam.pottery_altar_full_altar_weight, lfzi.fire_zone_name, lai.area_name, sdd.dict_label as potteryAltarState FROM laocz_pottery_altar_management lpam LEFT JOIN laocz_fire_zone_info lfzi ON lpam.fire_zone_id = lfzi.fire_zone_id LEFT JOIN laocz_area_info lai ON lfzi.area_id = lai.area_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data sdd ON lpam.pottery_altar_state = sdd.dict_value AND sdd.dict_type = 'Ceramide_condition'
and lpam.pottery_altar_id = #{potteryAltarId}
mapper.insert:
insert into laocz_pottery_altar_management ( pottery_altar_id , tenant_id , pottery_altar_number , pottery_altar_state , fire_zone_id , pottery_altar_full_altar_weight , pottery_altar_qr_code_address , create_by , create_time , update_by , update_time , remark) values
( #{item.potteryAltarId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.potteryAltarNumber}, #{item.potteryAltarState}, #{item.fireZoneId}, #{item.potteryAltarFullAltarWeight}, #{item.potteryAltarQrCodeAddress}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark})
